```
 Client
  ------

  Server
  ------
    fn(x, y) {
      compute
      return z
    }
```

```
 Client                      Server
  ------                      ------

          "fn", x, y
  request ---------->

                          compute fn(x, y)

            z = fn(x, y)
           <------------- response
```

```
 while true
        send req
        wait up to 10 seconds for reply
        if reply arrives
            return reply
        else
            continue 
```

```
 if seen[xid]:
      r = old[xid]
    else
      r = handler()
      old[xid] = r
      seen[xid] = true 
```
